about_the_game:
Survival Gameplay

Defend your home from endless waves of enemies, each more challenging than the last.

Resource Management

Collect coins to buy food and increase the population to place your units.

Roguelike Elements

Each time you level up, choose from one of three unique power-ups to enhance your abilities and customize your playstyle.

Diverse Units

Unlock and use 13 unique units to defend your home. You can move these units in the preparation phase ensuring your defenses remain strong after every wave.

Early Access

The game offers 4-5 hours of gameplay to unlock all the units, but you can keep playing endlessly to chase the high score. Join us in the development journey! Your feedback will be crucial as we add new features, balanced gameplay, and improve the overall experience.

Note From The Dev


Last Home is a labor of love developed by a solo developer, marking my first foray into the world of game development. This project represents hours of dedication, creativity, and passion. Your support means the world to me, and I hope you enjoy the experience as much as I enjoyed creating it. Thank you for joining me on this incredible journey.

name: Last Home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64-Bit Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-Bit Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default

short_description: Last Home is a rogue-lite tower defense pixel art game where you defend your home against relentless waves of enemies. Gather coins and food to deploy powerful units that will fortify your defenses. As you progress through the waves, unlock over 10 different types of units to enhance your strategy.
